#### a. Results A

```{r}
lobster_year <- lobster_abundance %>% 
  group_by(year, site) %>% 
  summarize(total_counts = sum(count))

ggplot(lobster_year, aes(x = year, y = total_counts)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = site)) +
  facet_wrap(~site)
```
